about_the_game:
Experience a new take on the MOBA genre!

Dive into fast-paced 10-minute matches of non-stop skirmish filled with impactful decision-making. Playing is easy—just move, cast spells and capture the flags to secure victory! However, mastering the game will take more than luck.

Tip the battle in your favour with elemental mayhem!

Hex grid-based maps and spell arsenal consisting of 6 different elements allow you to control the battlefield with towering flames, slippery ice, soaking water, and sturdy rocks. Each element has unique spells and effects that you can combine to discover even more ways to express yourself during every single match!

Choose your loadout and play it your way!

Go solo or team up with friends in quick matches, ranked games, or custom lobbies. With a variety of elements and spell combinations at your disposal it's easy to come up with new ways to play!

Explore the variety of islands or make one of your own!

Hexmental has plenty of unique islands for you to explore, each completely changing how your matches unfold. And if you’re feeling creative, you can design your own island for custom games with the in-game map editor!

short_description: Hexmental is a fast-paced CTF-based MOBA with diverse maps and objectives. Equip your character with elemental spells to blast your opponents and alter the environment in online or custom matches. Play solo or team up with friends and unleash your magic to secure victory for your team!
